forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. East wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. Northeast wind 5 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
Boston basks in the gentle embrace of a sunlit afternoon, where warmth dances gracefully around the edges of every leaf and small gathering of people seeking solace outdoors. The forecast whispers promises of a high near seventy, with a light east wind that carries the crisp scent of autumn already creeping into the corners of late summer. As evening approaches, the sky will shift to a more muted tone, with clouds gathering softly to cradle the city, inviting a cool hush that promises a low around fifty-seven.

The scene feels inviting, urging us to discard heavy layers and opt for light sweaters or flannels, perfect for a stroll along the Esplanade or a quiet cup of coffee at a cozy café. One might wander through the narrow streets of Beacon Hill, allowing the cool breeze to playfully tug at their hair, or perhaps make time for a leisurely visit to the Boston Public Gardens, where the swaying trees seem to share in our delight of this serene day. The atmosphere is devoid of fog, offering an unobstructed view of a city preparing to settle into a tranquil evening. In this blend of comfort and mildness, Boston encourages us to venture outside, savoring these golden hours before twilight takes center stage.
